name: Bird
description: Base lies on back with feet up, supporting flyer's hips. Flyer balances horizontally face-down. (AI generated)

name: Throne
description: Base sits with feet on flyer's hips. Flyer stands upright on base's feet. (AI generated)

name: Reverse Throne
description: Base's feet on flyer's hips. Flyer stands upright facing away from base. (AI generated)

name: Front Plank
description: Base lies on back with feet on flyer's shoulders/chest. Flyer holds plank position. (AI generated)

name: Shoulder Stand
description: Base lies on back supporting flyer's shoulders with hands, flyer is upside down, facing towards base feet. Base Hands (including thumbs) on flyer's back/shoulders. Base sees flyer back.

name: Reverse Shoulder Stand
description: Base lies on back supporting flyer's shoulders with hands, flyer is upside down facing towards base head. Base thumbs on flyer's back. Base sees flyer front.

name: Star
description: Base lies on back with one foot on flyer's hip, one on shoulder. Flyer spreads arms and legs like a star. (AI generated)

name: Folded Leaf
description: Base's feet on flyer's hips. Flyer folds forward, hands near base's head. (AI generated)

name: Chair
description: Base's feet on flyer's sit bones. Flyer sits upright as if in a chair. (AI generated)

name: Extended F2H
description: Extended foot-to-hand. Single-leg base pose with flyer's foot in base's hand, flyer extends upward. (AI generated)

name: Whale
description: Single-leg base pose. Base's foot on flyer's shoulders, flyer arches back. (AI generated)

name: Vishnu's Couch (Left)
description: Base's left foot supports flyer lying on their left side in a relaxed position. (AI generated)

name: Vishnu's Couch (Right)
description: Base's right foot supports flyer lying on their right side in a relaxed position. (AI generated)

name: Straddlebat
description: Base's feet on flyer's inner thighs. Flyer hangs upside-down with legs straddled. (AI generated)

name: Floating Paschi
description: Base's feet on flyer's inner thighs. Flyer inverted with legs together in forward fold. (AI generated)

name: Reverse Bird
description: Base lies on back with feet supporting flyer's hips. Flyer balances horizontally face-up. (AI generated)

name: Side Star (Left)
description: Base's feet on flyer's left hip and left shoulder. Flyer opens sideways to the left. (AI generated)

name: Side Star (Right)
description: Base's feet on flyer's right hip and right shoulder. Flyer opens sideways to the right. (AI generated)

name: Mono Reverse Shin-to-Foot Connected Hands (Left)
description: Single-leg base on left side. Flyer's shin to base's foot, hands connected, flyer faces away. (AI generated)

name: Mono Reverse Shin-to-Foot Connected Hands (Right)
description: Single-leg base on right side. Flyer's shin to base's foot, hands connected, flyer faces away. (AI generated)

name: Supported Mono Kneepit (Left)
description: Single-leg base on left side. Base's foot in flyer's knee pit with hand support. (AI generated)

name: Supported Mono Kneepit (Right)
description: Single-leg base on right side. Base's foot in flyer's knee pit with hand support. (AI generated)

name: Mono Backbird (Left)
description: Single-leg base on left side. Flyer balances horizontally face-up on one foot. (AI generated)

name: Mono Backbird (Right)
description: Single-leg base on right side. Flyer balances horizontally face-up on one foot. (AI generated)
